alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 10 at 2:25PM PST until March 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast California, including the following county, Inyo. * WHEN...Until 630 PM PST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 224 PM PST, local law enforcement reported flooding in the advisory area. Minor flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Stovepipe Wells, Panamint Springs and Towne Pass. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
